display.title: Upgrading your EBF for the millionth time
description: This is second nature at this point
This Quest will be completed with &&eeither&&r an &&3IV Energy Hatch&&r&&r... or an &&3IV Dynamo Hatch&&r for your Multiblock Generators.
Don't forget that &&d4 Amp&&r variants exist! However they require &&aNiobium-Titanium Cables&&r, which need &&9Polyphenylene Sulfide&&r.
Look down in the &&dLuV&&r Chapter for that (don't worry... it's easy to obtain).

subtitle.text: This is second nature at this point
